attributes.additional_details:
Bexley Council have decided to close the Belvedere Splash Park from April 2015 without leaving scope for the community to submit a rescue proposal. We are asking that Splash Park be removed from potential list of spending cuts for the year 2015/16 to enable to community to unite and present a viable solution.

The Splash Park is a free resource that enables fully integrated play for children from all walks of life, social situations and disabilities. It would be a travesty if the site, which has been a water park for over 100 years, was ripped out of the ground without full and open discussion and financial investigation.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local Council only.   You may wish to involve your MP in a campaign against closure?
